actions.description:
Trigger: At least one creature on the field gains @Affliction[fainted].

Effect: The user gains +1 SPATK Stage for 5 Activations. When using Fleur Cannon, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to add the [Exhaust] trait for that attack instead of losing -2 SPATK Stage.
